group_1.narration: ―Urara―@So you're saying this was the work of that Witch...?
―Asahi―@It's just speculation...@I don't really know for sure...
―Asahi―@But, if there is one thing I can say...
―Asahi―@The Witches were definitely that pair of@Magical Girls who became Witches in front of us...
―Urara―@They've been in Yukuni City all this time...?
―Asahi―@I assumed they'd already been defeated@or had run away, but...

group_1.textLeft: Breakfast is ready. Would you like to eat?

group_1.textRight: I don't have much of an appetite today either,@so I'd like a small portion, please.

group_1.narration: "One week after the accident at the Yukuni City event,@people were seen today laying flowers at the site@in memory of the victims."

group_1.textLeft: People from this village have passed away...@Others, too, have been afflicted with suffering...
I know it must be hard for you too, about your@friend.
If you don't find meaning in your survival@and move forward with purpose,
you'll only end up crushing yourself...

group_1.textCenter: (I'm struggling to cope with Haitani's death and@Kuroda's aggression...)
(But what I find equally disturbing, is the fact that
a video of me speaking with Urara Yume at the@scene has leaked onto the internet.)

group_1.narration: Someone at the scene must have taken it...@As the URL circulated among the students of Yukuni,@so too have those misconceptions that misled Kuroda been@spreading throughout the past week...

group_1.textLeft: Well, anyhow, I will be rooting for you today.

group_1.textRight: I still wanna be friends with you, Miura.@That's all I wanted to tell you.

group_1.narration: The certainty that we can never return to those@days grips my heart like an unyielding thorn...

group_1.textLeft: That girl...right...?@She's the one from the video, isn't she?

group_1.textRight: She must be the Magical Girl guest Urara Yume@mentioned, right?
Rumor has it that she conjured a Witch right@before going up on stage...

group_1.textLeft: Could she really be causing all those accidents@on purpose?

group_1.textRight: Miura, you shouldn't let it get to you.
And that video, it's just like cosplay, isn't it?
I mean, there's been others in similar situations.
It ain't just Haitani. Don't you have any idea@how many people have died?
And Miura said it herself that Magical Girls are@Witches.
They get to do whatever they want with their@mysterious powers that even the police can't touch.

group_1.textLeft: Wasn't that just some urban legend Urara Yume mentioned?!
Don't you pin it on Miura!

group_1.narration: "Bullshit!@You know loads of people have actually@seen the video, right?!"
"Come on,@the only reason Miura hasn't spoken up already@is 'cause she's got something to be guilty of!"
"Hey Miura!@Say something to them, will you?"

group_1.textLeft: Actually, I was trying to prevent harm at the time...

group_1.textRight: If someone like Miura is just gonna turn into@a homicidal Witch,
then the very existence of Magical Girls is nothing@but a threat to us.
Besides, maybe she's just pretending@to be a good guy.
The way she killed Haitani is a perfect example...

group_1.textCenter: (What happened at the Festival is not a@responsibility on my hands...)
(Should I resist death, my path will inevitably@end with me becoming a Witch...)
(Even if I continue to protect others, I am@destined to become one who spreads curses...)
(How can I say that I am innocent when such a@fate is my certain future...?)
